resources.string: Please enter the verification code sent via SMS.

Phone numbers will be used for identification purposes and to prevent misuse of the Bizmo service. 
 
 It will not be shown to other users unless you change settings. 
 
To use Bizmo please verify your Phone Number
You will receive a verification code to this number via SMS. If you want to change your phone number, please select “Cancel”.
By using your phone book all your contacts already using Bizmo will be automatically added to connection list.
You will automatically be added onto the connection list of any user who has your phone number saved on his/her device, regardsless of whether you actually know the person or not.
\u2022 Users added to your connections list will be able to check your profile and chat with you. \n\n \u2022 You can always change your privacy settings by going to “Privacy Settings”.

• Only the phone number and mobile email addresses will be used. All other informations(images and names etc)will not be used. 

 • All data will be encrypted and send securely to our servers. This data will not be used for any other purposes other than to search for connections and to prevent misuse of Bizmo service. 

 • You can always change your privacy settings by going to “Privacy Settings”. 

 • When a connection cancels their phone number, there may be occasions when it become used by someone else. Please make sure you keep your contacts list/phone book organized.
Are you sure to logout from Bizmo?
Do you want to link your profile with Facebook?
Do you want to link your profile with Vkontakte?

Let\'s meet and chat with Bizmo!
